wpPost.title: Welcoming global experts to the Project Logistics Alliance Annual Meeting 2022

seo.title: Welcoming global experts to the Project Logistics Alliance Annual Meeting 2022 - FLS
seo.metaDesc: As the Gala Dinner and lanyard sponsor, FLS Group were proud to be part of the successful PLA Annual Meeting in October 2022.
seo.opengraphTitle: Welcoming global experts to the Project Logistics Alliance Annual Meeting 2022 - FLS
seo.opengraphDescription: As the Gala Dinner and lanyard sponsor, FLS Group were proud to be part of the successful PLA Annual Meeting in October 2022.

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: As the Gala Dinner and lanyard sponsor, we were proud to be part of the successful Project Logistics Alliance Annual Meeting in October 2022.

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: Here’s what the organiser had to say about this unique event: “We sincerely thank FLS Group for helping us execute this unforgettable night at the Eesti Meremuuseum (Estonian Maritime Museum).

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: Together with James Muruthi, Managing Director of FLS Projects, James Mumford, Business Development Manager of FLS Group, represented our Group. Mr Mumford summed up the event nicely: “A brilliant conference set in a beautiful city, perfect for networking and building fantastic international business relationships for our clients’ upcoming projects.”

blocks.name: core/paragraph
blocks.saveContent: We are looking forward to welcoming you all again next year!
